The post-step that produces this file is in openshift/release at this location: .

The code for the command that produces this file is in https://github.com/Azure/ARO-HCP/tree/main/test/cmd/aro-hcp-tests.

PRs welcome.

When you get to the data explorer, you should be looking at logs for a particular job (maybe a particular component or a resourcegroup). If you look to the left, you can see some schema hints. In theory, the "log" column has the raw message. As of the time of writing, I cannot figure out why the contest appears to be missing from the backend logs.
